descriptionHtml:
[font=Arial]yo guys, ftw4 here.

This mod adds an archer follower, named Bora.
She is essential, marriageble.
nothing special, simple follower mod.

I have tested her in vanilla + require mods.

Please post your screenshot!

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/17452]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/17452[/url]
[/font][font=Arial]SSE version is now available on nexus. Thanks for coverting, [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/users/43137077]thangkhi1214[/url]!

[/font][b][font=Arial][size=5]Bora Follower (UUNP)
[/size]

[/font][/b][font=Arial]location : Whiterun, Dragonsreach
Name : Bora
Body : UUNP HDT series
Style : Archer with Light Armor
Weight : 100



not naked this time.





[/font][center][b][font=Arial][size=5]◆ REQUIREMENTS
